item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays.

We have a new and exciting location this week: The Study Hotel!

Opened for only about a week now, The Study is a beutiful new hotel located right on Chapel Street, across from The New School of Art. The owner describes it as "a bit European, a bit traditional, a bit contemporary". If you haven't seen it yet you have to come and check it out, it's a beautiful addition to New Haven. (And if you've been inside The Colony Hotel, the hotel this one replaces, be prepared to be in-shock when you walk in!)

Specials for The Collective will be free appetizers and perhaps a drink special or two, TBD.

Contact is Ed: (203) 583-9668

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: Happy Hour at the All-New Study Hotel on Chapel Street!
